title: swtich from samtools to genomecov for covid
body: if coverage > 20000, need to add an option in samtools or use geomecov

title: pbl when there is no annotation
body:
-  fill config.yaml correctly if no annotation is provided
- switch snpeff off I no annotation

title: Set the bwa index algorithm automatically
body:
should set te index algoritm to is or bwtsw automatically based on genome length:



    is	IS linear-time algorithm for constructing suffix array. It requires 5.37N memory where N is the size of the database. IS is moderately fast, but does not work with database larger than 2GB. IS is the default algorithm due to its simplicity. The current codes for IS algorithm are reimplemented by Yuta Mori.
    bwtsw	Algorithm implemented in BWT-SW. This method works with the whole human genome, but it does not work with database smaller than 10MB and it is usually slower than IS.

title: if snpeff and coverage are false, multiqc fails
if input is made of BAM, the readtag should be unset
in rare occassion genomecov does not sort properly the chromosomes
body: the double_bed rule fails if the tw bed files created by samtools and bedtools are sorted differently
